components/products/usedtakeoffshipping:
If an order is placed before 1pm EST on a business day we ship the order the same day.

Our tires are shipped through FedEx standard ground FREE to the 48 contiguous states. Orders under $500 will be shipped no signature required and will be delivered at FedEx's discretion. For orders above $500 a signature will be required at time of delivery.

Buyers from Pennsylvania or if you are shipping to Pennsylvania the 6.00% PA sales tax will apply.

Non-Contiguous States

For shipping quotes to Alaska, Hawaii, or Puerto Rico please contact us at 1-866-480-8477 or before you place an order.

We do not ship to Canada!

FedEx can deliver to confirmed street addresses only (residential or business), they cannot deliver to PO, APO, or FPO. Please be sure that your shipping address is correct with all necessary information as any requests for change will delay shipping by 1 business day. To edit the shipping address please email us at with the correct address.
